review: An excellent "box".  Interestingly much cleaner than the Apple TV.  Amazon's access to programming such as the HBO series available to Prime customers is also a great feature.
author: David G. Ballou

review: The reason I purchased this is for the free prime movies. I am pretty happy that I did. Glad to have another option to rent / buy movies than Apple it keeps companies interested in giving us consumers a deal.The only thing I don't like about this compared to apple TV is that when streaming, the movie buffers on a regular basis. We have an apple TV also and that streams seamlessly so its not the internet connection, it has to be the unit (at least in my mind), keep in mind this is connecting wirelessly. I love the voice activated search and the free prime movies. I will try and wire the device to internet and see if that fixes the issue, if so than this is a 5 star product. The design of the unit and remote (and packaging) are very appleesque feels good and works good, good to see another company presenting the product the way it should be done, happy there wasn't a gigantic plastic impossible to open clamshell packaging I hate those...
author: SBHIPPIE

review: As good as the Apple TV. Only thing missing is iTunes (of course) and HBO GO. If you have a Prime account and access to Amazon ecosphere it's worth it to consider over Roku. I still like my Apple TV as well.
author: Bruce Carey

review: Love it kind of expensive but works great

review: Lowered my cable bill from $210 a month to $68 each month for basic and internet.  If you are the person that wants to watch a specific new person at the time it is released this may not be for you.  More movies and shows than I could ever imagine.
